title: Bond Bubble Bigger
sub_head: Do Biden and the Fed have any idea what fire they’re playing with?
body:
The inflation beast is running at full speed through the economy. Yet the Federal Reserve has decided it will continue giving the creature heavy doses of adrenaline for a few more months before concluding a historic rampage of money creation. Then the Fed believes things will quickly settle back down into a serene period of low inflation with only slight increases from current rock-bottom interest rates.
What is even more bizarre is that as wrong as the Fed has been in predicting inflation over the last year, financial markets continue to signal extreme confidence in the Fed and other central banks—with investors paying a historically high price for the privilege of lending their money to the U.S. Treasury and other governments around the world.
